activities: Personal Information is collected when a user creates an account or registers for Brother services.  The information is used to validate users, process payments, update Brother records, manage service subscriptions, recall user settings, deliver services and support to the user and generally maintain a users account.  Personal information may be shared with third parties only as necessary for delivering the services to the user and Brother will only share information with a third party Brother believes provides appropriate data security protection.  Personal Information is stored on computer servers with limited access and when transfers of data are necessary, they are transferred through the use of SSL encryption.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online data; customer data; manually processed data
